html: DYK: In 2017, Oklahoma exported $1.4 BILLION worth of goods to Canada. Today I met with the Consulate General of Canada where we discussed the trade relationship between Oklahoma and Canada. It is time Congress passed the USMCA to further promote free markets and free trade.pic.twitter.com/NS1UukZjL2
text:
DYK: In 2017, Oklahoma exported $1.4 BILLION worth of goods to Canada. 

Today I met with the Consulate General of Canada where we discussed the trade relationship between Oklahoma and Canada. 

It is time Congress passed the USMCA to further promote free markets and free trade.pic.twitter.com/NS1UukZjL2
